classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
     * Time in ms for the ripple effect when clicking on the button.
     * Only active if useRippleEffect is set to true.
     * @member {Number} rippleEffectDuration=400
     */
classData.description:
Time in ms for the ripple effect when clicking on the button.
Only active if useRippleEffect is set to true.
classData.name: rippleEffectDuration

classData.comment:

classData.description: Internal flag to store the last setTimeout() id for ripple effect remove node callbacks

classData.comment:
/**
         * false calls Neo.Main.setRoute()
         * @member {Boolean} editRoute=true
         */
classData.description: false calls Neo.Main.setRoute()
classData.name: editRoute

classData.description:
Shortcut for domListeners={click:handler}
A string based value assumes that the handlerFn lives inside a ComponentController
classData.name: handler_

classData.comment:
/**
         * The scope (this pointer) inside the handler function.
         * Points to the button instance by default.
         * @member {Object|null} handlerScope=null
         */
classData.description:
The scope (this pointer) inside the handler function.
Points to the button instance by default.
classData.name: handlerScope

classData.comment:
/**
         * The CSS class to use for an icon, e.g. 'fa fa-home'
         * @member {String|null} [iconCls_=null]
         */
classData.description: The CSS class to use for an icon, e.g. 'fa fa-home'
classData.name: iconCls_

classData.comment:
/**
         * The color to use for an icon, e.g. '#ff0000' [optional]
         * @member {String|null} iconColor_=null
         */
classData.description: The color to use for an icon, e.g. '#ff0000' [optional]
classData.name: iconColor_

classData.comment:
/**
         * The position of the icon in case iconCls has a value.
         * Valid values are: 'top', 'right', 'bottom', 'left'
         * @member {String} iconPosition_='left'
         */
classData.description:
The position of the icon in case iconCls has a value.
Valid values are: 'top', 'right', 'bottom', 'left'
classData.name: iconPosition_

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: The pressed state of the Button

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: Change the browser hash value on click

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: The text displayed on the button [optional]
classData.name: text_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Transforms the button tag into an a tag [optional]

classData.description: Transforms the button tag into an a tag [optional]

classData.comment:
/**
